alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bertie, eastern Northampton, Hertford and west central Chowan Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lewiston Woodville, or near Aulander, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Aulander around 525 PM EDT. Powellsville around 535 PM EDT. Ahoskie around 540 PM EDT. Cofield around 550 PM EDT. Winton around 555 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Newsome Store, Mapleton and Republican. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
